combat_medic.name: Combat Medic
combat_medic.description:
BASIC: 1 point	You gain a 30% damage reduction for 5 seconds both after and during reviving another player.
ACE: 3 points	Reviving a crew member gives them 30% more health.

quick_fix.name: Quick Fix
quick_fix.description:
BASIC: 2 points	Decreases your First Aid Kit and Doctor Bag deploy time by 50%.
ACE: 4 points	Crew Members that use your First Aid Kits or Doctor Bags take 10% less damage for 120 seconds.

painkillers.name: Painkillers
painkillers.description:
BASIC: 2 points	Crew members you revive take 30% less damage for 5 seconds.
ACE: 4 points	The damage reduction is increased by an additional 50%

uppers.name: Uppers
uppers.description:
BASIC: 3 points	Adds 7 more First Aid Kits to your inventory.
ACE: 6 points	Adds 3 First Aid Kits to your inventory. Your deployed First Aid Kits will be automatically used if a player is downed within a 5 meter radius of the First Aid Kit. This cannot occur more than once every 20 seconds.

combat_doctor.name: Combat Doctor
combat_doctor.description:
BASIC: 3 points	You can now deploy 2 Doctor Bags instead of just one.
ACE: 6 points	Your doctor bags have 2 more charges.

inspire.name: Inspire
inspire.description:
BASIC: 4 points	You revive crew members 100% faster. Shouting at your teammates will increase their movement and reload speed by 20% for 10 seconds.
ACE: 8 points	There is a 100% chance that you can revive crew members at a distance of up to 9 meters by shouting at them. This cannot occur more than every 20 seconds.

forced_friendship.name: Forced Friendship
forced_friendship.description:
BASIC: 1 point	Increase your supply of cable ties by 4. You can cable tie hostages 75% faster.
ACE: 3 points	You and your crew gain 0.5 damage absorptions for each hostage you have. This effect stacks with up to a maximum of 8 hostages.
Note: This skill does not stack with other players Forced Friendship skill.

confident.name: Confident
confident.description:
BASIC: 2 points	The power and range of your intimidation is increased by 50%.
ACE: 4 points	You can now have 2 converted enemies at the same time.

joker.name: Joker
joker.description:
BASIC: 2 points	You can convert a non-special enemy to fight on your side.	This can not be done during stealth and the enemy must have surrendered in order for you to convert them.
You can only convert one non-special enemy at a time.
ACE: 4 points	Your converted enemy deals 35% more damage. The time to convert an enemy is reduced by 65%.

stockholm_syndrome.name: Stockholm Syndrome
stockholm_syndrome.description:
BASIC: 3 points	Civilians are intimidated by the noise you make and remain intimidated 50% longer.
ACE: 6 points	Your hostages will not flee when they have been rescued by law enforcers. Whenever you get into custody, your hostages will trade themselves for your safe return. This effect can occur during assaults, but only 1 time during a heist.

partners_in_crime.name: Partners in Crime
partners_in_crime.description:
BASIC: 3 points	Having a converted enemy increases your movement speed by 10%.
Your converted enemy takes 45% less damage.
ACE: 6 points	Having a converted enemy increases your health by 30%.
Your converted enemy takes an additional 54% less damage.

hostage_taker.name: Hostage Taker
hostage_taker.description:
BASIC: 4 points	Having at least one of your own hostage or converted law enforcer makes you regenerate 1.5% health every 5 seconds.
ACE: 8 points	Having at least one of your own hostage or converted law enforcer makes you regenerate 4.5% health every 5 seconds.

stable_shot.name: Stable Shot
stable_shot.description:
BASIC: 1 point	You gain 8 weapon stability.
ACE: 3 points	You gain 16 weapon accuracy while standing still.

rifleman.name: Rifleman
rifleman.description:
BASIC: 2 points	Your snap to zoom is 100% faster with all weapons.
Your movement speed is unhindered while using steel sight.
ACE: 4 points	Your weapon zoom level is increased by 25% with all weapons. Your weapon accuracy while moving with SMGs, Assault Rifles and Sniper Rifles is increased by 16.
rifleman.vr_description: Addition in VR:	BASIC: Every kill while aiming down sight will regenerate 2% stamina.	Every 25 points of stamina consumed by dashing will refill 5% of their ammo pool to single shot weapons.	ACE: The improved accuracy lasts from 1 up to a maximum of 5 seconds after dashing.

marksman.name: Marksman
marksman.description:
BASIC: 2 points	You gain 8 weapon accuracy with all SMGs, Assault Rifles and Sniper Rifles fired in single shot fire mode.
ACE: 4 points	You gain a 20% accuracy bonus while aiming down sights with all SMGs, Assault Rifles and Sniper Rifles fired in single shot fire mode.

ammo_efficiency.name: Ammo Efficiency
ammo_efficiency.description:
BASIC: 3 points	Getting 3 headshots in less than 6 seconds will refund 1 bullet to your used weapon. Can only be triggered by SMGs, Assault Rifles and Sniper Rifles fired in single shot fire mode.
ACE: 6 points	The amount of headshots required is reduced to 2.

aggressive_reload.name: Aggressive Reload
aggressive_reload.description:
BASIC: 3 points	Increases your reload speed with SMGs, Assault Rifles and Sniper Rifles by 15%.
ACE: 6 points	Any killing headshot will increase your reload speed by 100% for 4 seconds. Can only be triggered by SMGs, Assault Rifles and Sniper Rifles fired in single shot fire mode.

graze.name: Graze
graze.description:
BASIC: 4 points	Snipers that hit their target deal 20% of the damage dealth in a 100cm radius around the bullet trajectory.
ACE: 8 points	If a bullet would headshot-kill someone, the graze skill will deal 100% of the weapon's damage instead of 20%.

underdog.name: Underdog
underdog.description:
BASIC: 1 point	When three or more enemies within 10 meters are targeting you, you receive a 15% damage bonus that lasts for 7 seconds.
ACE: 3 points	When three or more enemies within 18 meters are targeting you, you also receive a 10% damage reduction that lasts for 7 seconds.
Note: Does not apply to melee damage, throwables, grenade launchers or rocket launchers.

shotgun_cqb.name: Shotgun CQB
shotgun_cqb.description:
BASIC: 2 points	You reload Shotguns 15% faster.
ACE: 4 points	You reload Shotguns 35% faster. You gain a 125% increased steel sight zoom speed when using Shotguns.
shotgun_cqb.vr_description: Addition in VR:	ACE: Every kill while aiming down sight will regenerate 2% stamina.

shotgun_impact.name: Shotgun Impact
shotgun_impact.description:
BASIC: 2 points	Your weapon stability with all shotguns is increased by 8. You deal 5% more damage with Shotguns.
ACE: 4 points	You deal an additional 10% more damage with shotguns.

far_away.name: Far Away
far_away.description:
BASIC: 3 points	Your accuracy bonus while aiming down sights with Shotguns is increased by 40%.
ACE: 6 points	You gain a 50% increased effective range with Shotguns when aiming down sights.

close_by.name: Close By
close_by.description:
BASIC: 3 points	You can now hip-fire with your Shotguns while sprinting.
ACE: 6 points	Your rate of fire is increased by 35% while firing from the hip with single shot Shotguns. Sotguns with magazines have their magazine sizes increased by 15 shells
close_by.vr_description: Addition in VR:	BASIC: After dashing the player kills have a 100% chance to fear enemies within 8 meters of the player for 1 up to a maximum of 3 seconds depending on the amount of stamina consumed by the jump.

overkill.name: Overkill
overkill.description:
BASIC: 4 points	When you kill an enemy with a Shotgun or the OVE9000 portable saw, you receive 75% damage increase for 20 seconds.
ACE: 8 points	The damage bonus now applies to all weapons. Skill must still be activated using a Shotgun or the OVE9000 portable saw. Your weapon swap speed is increased by 80%.
Note: Does not apply to melee damage, throwables, grenade launchers or rocket launchers.

resilience.name: Resilience
resilience.description:
BASIC: 1 point	Increases your armor recovery rate by 15%.
ACE: 3 points	Reduces the visual effect duration of Flashbangs by 75%.

die_hard.name: Die Hard
die_hard.description:
BASIC: 2 points	You take 50% less damage while interacting with objects.
ACE: 4 points	Increases the armor of all Ballistic vests by 20.

transporter.name: Transporter
transporter.description:
BASIC: 2 points	You can throw bags 50% further.
ACE: 4 points	For each 10 armor points the bag movement penaly is reduced by 1%.

shock_and_awe.name: Shock and Awe
shock_and_awe.description:
BASIC: 3 points	Increases the armor recovery rate for you and your crew by 25%.
ACE: 6 points	Enables your weapons to have a chance to knock back Shield enemies when attacking them. Ranged weapons' knockback chance is increased the higher the total damage of the weapon is. Melee weapons' knockback chance is 100%.

bullseye.name: Bullseye
bullseye.description:
BASIC: 3 points	You regenerate 5 armor for each succesful headshot. This can not occur more than once every 2 seconds.
ACE: 6 points	You regenerate an additional 20 armor for each succesful headshot.

iron_man.name: Iron Man
iron_man.description:
BASIC: 4 points	Your total armor value is increased by 30%.
ACE: 8 points	Unlocks the ability to wear the Improved Combined Tactical Vest.

scavenger.name: Scavenger
scavenger.description:
BASIC: 1 point	Your ammo pick up range is increased by 50%.
ACE: 3 points	Every 6th enemy you kill will drop an extra ammo box.

bulletstorm.name: Bulletstorm
bulletstorm.description:
BASIC: 2 points	Ammo bags placed by you grant players the ability to shoot without depleting their ammunition for up to 5 seconds after interacting with it. The more ammo players replenish, the longer the duration of the effect.
ACE: 4 points	Increases the base duration of the effect by up to 15 seconds.

portable_saw.name: Portable Saw
portable_saw.description:
BASIC: 2 points	Unlocks the OVE9000 portable saw for you to use as a secondary weapon.
ACE: 4 points	You gain 1 extra saw blade for the OVE9000 portable saw. You replace your saw blades with carbon blades, increasing your saw efficiency by 40%.

extra_lead.name: Extra Lead
extra_lead.description:
BASIC: 3 points	You can now place 2 ammo bags instead of just one.
ACE: 6 points	Each ammo bag now contains 50% more ammunition.

saw_massacre.name: Saw Massacre
saw_massacre.description:
BASIC: 3 points	Reducing the wear down of the blades on enemies by 50%.
ACE: 6 points	You can now saw through shield enemies with your OVE9000 portable saw. When killing an enemy with the saw, you have a 50% chance to cause nearby enemies in a 10m radius to panic. Panic will make enemies go into short bursts of uncontrollable fear.

fully_loaded.name: fully_loaded
fully_loaded.description:
BASIC: 4 points	Your total ammo capacity is increased by 25%.
ACE: 8 points	Increases the amount of ammo you gain from ammo boxes by 75%. You also gain a 5% base chance to get a throwable from an ammo box. The base chance is increased by 1% for each ammo box you pick up that does not contain a throwable. When a throwable has been found, the chance is reset to it's base value
Note: Does not stack with the perk deck skill "Walk-in Closet".
